channel.title: Comments on: Dinosaur Jr. strips down The Cure for Playboy

item.title: By: Trey
item.dc:creator: Trey
item.description: They never lasted more than a day. When they would arrive the happy hour crowd might pass them around then they would usually disappear before nightfall. I remember in one of the first issues we got there was a results of an online readers poll for who they wanted in a pictorial most and the landslide winner was Neko Case. I found it very bizarre that Playboy readers knew who she was much less wanted to see her naked.
item.content:encoded: They never lasted more than a day. When they would arrive the happy hour crowd might pass them around then they would usually disappear before nightfall. I remember in one of the first issues we got there was a results of an online readers poll for who they wanted in a pictorial most and the landslide winner was Neko Case. I found it very bizarre that Playboy readers knew who she was much less wanted to see her naked.

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: that's hilarious. were they often stolen?

item.title: By: Trey
item.dc:creator: Trey
item.description: thought you might find it interesting that a couple years into owning the Village Tavern I got a letter from Playboy that we had been selected aas part of a new marketing campaign to put Playboy directly in front of consumers. They wanted to know if we would be willing to receive multiple copies of the magazine and place or display them in such a way that customers could see and read them. Of course we accepted and I'm pretty sure they still get them. Between all the Niko Case articles, marketing to indie rock clubs, and Dinosaur Jr vids, Playboy must consider aging indie rockers a pretty sizable part of their niche.
item.content:encoded: thought you might find it interesting that a couple years into owning the Village Tavern I got a letter from Playboy that we had been selected aas part of a new marketing campaign to put Playboy directly in front of consumers. They wanted to know if we would be willing to receive multiple copies of the magazine and place or display them in such a way that customers could see and read them. Of course we accepted and I’m pretty sure they still get them. Between all the Niko Case articles, marketing to indie rock clubs, and Dinosaur Jr vids, Playboy must consider aging indie rockers a pretty sizable part of their niche.

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: agreed. i'd pay to have seen that lot going at it on the ping pong table.
item.content:encoded: agreed. i’d pay to have seen that lot going at it on the ping pong table.

item.title: By: Erin Reed
item.dc:creator: Erin Reed
item.description: thanks eric! i loved the live song, but mostly, my day has been made by picturing J Mascis and Robert Smith playing ping pong together. god why didn't someone take a photo of that.
item.content:encoded: thanks eric! i loved the live song, but mostly, my day has been made by picturing J Mascis and Robert Smith playing ping pong together. god why didn’t someone take a photo of that.
